SetOp.parameter: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <root class="ImagePreprocessing" version="1"> <parameter class="ImagePreprocessingParameter" version="2"> <timeFilterParameter class="TimeFilterParameter" version="1"> <apply class="bool" value="false" /> <kind class="int32" value="0" /> <length class="uint32_t" value="3" /> <formatBeforeButterworth class="int32" value="2" /> <formatAfterButterworth class="int32" value="0" /> <useFrameFactors class="bool" value="false" /> <framesCount class="uint32_t" value="4" /> <frameFactor0 class="double" value="1" /> <frameFactor1 class="double" value="1" /> <frameFactor2 class="double" value="1" /> <frameFactor3 class="double" value="1" /> </timeFilterParameter> <maskParameter class="MaskingParameter" version="1"> <Apply class="bool" value="false" /> <Masks /> </maskParameter> <useSubtractSlidingMinimum class="bool" value="false" /> <subtractSlidingMinimumLength class="uint32_t" value="3" /> <useNormalizeWithLocalAverage class="bool" value="false" /> <localAverageLength class="uint32_t" value="300" /> <localAverageMode class="int32" value="1" /> <localAverageSummandCount class="uint32_t" value="3" /> <useNormalizeAllFrames class="bool" value="true" /> <useSlidingGaussian class="bool" value="false" /> <slidingGaussianLength class="double" value="1.2" /> <useSharpening class="bool" value="false" /> <useSubtractConstant class="bool" value="true" /> <subtractConstantValue class="uint32_t" value="0" /> <useMultiplyWithFactor class="bool" value="false" /> <multiplyWithFactorValue class="float" value="25" /> </parameter> </root>
